channel.title: Ordinary Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ordinary Village"

item.title: Re: Ordinary Village
item.content:encoded:
Giving this topic a bump. I still need villagers. We're currently sitting at 18, and I need two more before I can get some new upgrades we need.

Whether it's with your main or with an alt, it would really help me out to have just one or two more villagers.

The Super Rare item offer is no longer good, by the way. I've already given away what I have.

item.title: Ordinary Village
item.content:encoded:
Yes, I started a new village, and yes, I need members now.

As a means to get members, I am offering a number of Super Rare party house items to those who join early, along with other, less valuable permanents.

So, if you need a village, or are creating an alt, join here, and I'll be sure to get you/your alt off to the right start.
